<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/folder/{folderId}/order"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets file order in the folder with ID specified in the request

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"folderId","in":"path","description":"Folder ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Order","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"order":{"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer","description":"Order","format":"int32","example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Order request parameters","title":"ASC.Files.Core.ApiModels.RequestDto.OrderRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
